name: BAFT (Bankers Association for Finance and Trade)
goal: BAFT, the leading global financial services association for international transaction banking, helps bridge solutions across financial institutions, service providers and the regulatory community that promote sound financial practices enabling innovation, efficiency, and commercial growth. BAFT engages on a wide range of topics affecting transaction banking, including trade finance, payments, and compliance. The association website is www.baft.org.
interests: Banking and financial services, Economy, finance and the euro, Trade
euInitiatives: Implementation of the Basel Framework (BRRD, CRR), AML rules, Fintech Roadmap
